title: GBP and JPY Eyeballing Domestic Politics
description: Markets A three-day slide in stock and crypto markets pulled dip-buyers from the sidelines going into the weekend. Equities bounced more than 2% in the US. Bitcoin hit the 60k mark, a 1.5 year low, before recovering to north of 70k again.
